bibl.title: Governmental Roles in the Economy of Late Antiquity.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings
bibl.author: BAGNALL, Roger S.

bibl.note: The direct impact of the Late Roman State on production and distribution of economic goods. Focuses on examples from Egypt.
BAGNALL Roger S., Governmental Roles in the Economy of Late Antiquity.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings (Milano, 1994) pp. 61-69.
